verses.verse: <S%G3778><s%> For This <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Melchizedek, <S%G3198><s%> King <S%G935><s%> Of Salem, <S%G4532><s%> Priest <S%G2409><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Most High, <S%G5310><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Met <S%G4876><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%> Returning <S%G5290><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Smiting <S%G2871><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Kings, <S%G935><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Blessed <S%G2127><s%> Him; <S%G846><s%>

To Whom <S%G3739><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> A Tenth <S%G1181><s%> Of <S%G575><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Divided <S%G3307><s%> Abraham; <S%G11><s%> <S%G4412><s%> First <S%G3303><s%> Being Interpreted <S%G2059><s%> King <S%G935><s%> Of Righteousness, <S%G1343><s%> Then <S%G1899><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> King <S%G935><s%> Of Salem, <S%G4532><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> King <S%G935><s%> Of Peace; <S%G1515><s%>

Without Father, <S%G540><s%> Without Mother, <S%G282><s%> Without Genealogy; <S%G35><s%> Neither <S%G3383><s%> Beginning <S%G746><s%> Of Days <S%G2250><s%> Nor <S%G3383><s%> Of Life <S%G2222><s%> End <S%G5056><s%> Having, <S%G2192><s%> <S%G871><s%> But Assimilated <S%G1161><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> Abides <S%G3306><s%> A Priest <S%G2409><s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> In Perpetuity. <S%G1336><s%>

<S%G2334><s%> <S%G2334><s%> Now Consider <S%G1161><s%> How Great <S%G4080><s%> This One Was <S%G3778><s%> To Whom <S%G3739><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> A Tenth <S%G1181><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%> Gave <S%G1325><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spoils <S%G205><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Patriarch. <S%G3966><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They <S%G3588><s%> Indeed <S%G3303><s%> From Among <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sons <S%G5207><s%> Of Levi <S%G3017><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Priesthood Who <S%G2405><s%> Receive, <S%G2983><s%> Commandment <S%G1785><s%> Have <S%G2192><s%> To Take Tithes From <S%G586><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> People <S%G2992><s%> According <S%G2596><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Law, <S%G3551><s%> ' <S%G5124><s%> <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> Their Brethern <S%G846><s%> Though <S%G2539><s%> Having Come <S%G1831><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Loins <S%G3751><s%> Of Abraham; <S%G11><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But He Who <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Reckons No Genealogy <S%G1075><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Has Tithed <S%G1183><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Abraham, <S%G11><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Had <S%G2192><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Promises, <S%G1860><s%> Has Blessed. <S%G2127><s%>

<S%G5565><s%> But Apart From <S%G1161><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Gainsaying <S%G485><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Inferior <S%G1640><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Superior <S%G2909><s%> Is Blessed. <S%G2127><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5602><s%> Here <S%G3303><s%> Tithes <S%G1181><s%> That Die <S%G599><s%> Men <S%G444><s%> Receive; <S%G2983><s%> <S%G1563><s%> But There One <S%G1161><s%> Witnessed Of <S%G3140><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> He Lives; <S%G2198><s%>

And, <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5613><s%> <S%G2031><s%> So To Speak, <S%G2036><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> Abraham, <S%G11><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Levi, <S%G3017><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Tithes <S%G1181><s%> Receives, <S%G2983><s%> Has Been Tithed. <S%G1183><s%>

<S%G2089><s%> For Yet <S%G1063><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Loins <S%G3751><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of His Father <S%G3962><s%> He Was <S%G2258><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> Met <S%G4876><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Melchizedek. <S%G3198><s%>

<S%G1487><s%> If Indeed <S%G3303><s%> Then <S%G3767><s%> Perfection <S%G5050><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Levitical <S%G3020><s%> Priesthood <S%G2420><s%> Were, <S%G2258><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2992><s%> For The People Based <S%G1063><s%> ' Upon <S%G1909><s%> It <S%G846><s%> , Had Received The Law, <S%G3549><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Still <S%G2089><s%> Need Was There <S%G5532><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Order <S%G5010><s%> Of Melchizedek For <S%G3198><s%> Another <S%G2087><s%> To Arise <S%G450><s%> Priest; <S%G2409><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> According <S%G2596><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Order <S%G5010><s%> Of Aaron <S%G2><s%> To Be Named? <S%G3004><s%>

<S%G3346><s%> For Being Changed <S%G1063><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Priesthood, <S%G2420><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> Necessity <S%G318><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Of Law <S%G3551><s%> A Change <S%G3331><s%> Takes Place. <S%G1096><s%>

' <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3739><s%> For He Of Whom <S%G1063><s%> Are Said <S%G3004><s%> These Things, <S%G5023><s%> A Tribe <S%G5443><s%> Different <S%G2087><s%> Has Part In, <S%G3348><s%> ' <S%G575><s%> Of Which <S%G3739><s%> No One <S%G3762><s%> Has Given Attendance <S%G4337><s%> At The <S%G3588><s%> Altar. <S%G2379><s%>

<S%G4271><s%> For It Is Manifest <S%G1063><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> Judah <S%G2448><s%> Has Sprung <S%G393><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Our Lord, <S%G2257><s%> As To <S%G1519><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Tribe <S%G5443><s%> Nothing <S%G3762><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Priesthood <S%G2420><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> Spoke. <S%G2980><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> More Abundantly <S%G4054><s%> Yet <S%G2089><s%> Quite Manifest <S%G2612><s%> It Is, <S%G2076><s%> Since <S%G1487><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Similitude <S%G3665><s%> Of Melchizedek <S%G3198><s%> Arises <S%G450><s%> A Priest <S%G2409><s%> Different, <S%G2087><s%>

Who <S%G3739><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> Law <S%G3551><s%> Of Commandment <S%G1785><s%> Fleshly <S%G4559><s%> Has Been Constituted, <S%G1096><s%> But <S%G235><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> Power <S%G1411><s%> Of Life <S%G2222><s%> Indissoluble. <S%G179><s%>

<S%G3140><s%> <S%G1063><s%> For He Testifies, <S%G3754><s%> Thou Art <S%G4771><s%> A Priest <S%G2409><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Ever <S%G165><s%> After <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Order <S%G5010><s%> Of Melchizedek. <S%G3198><s%>

<S%G115><s%> A Putting Away <S%G3303><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> There Is <S%G1096><s%> Of The Going Before <S%G4254><s%> Commandment, <S%G1785><s%> Because Of <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G846><s%> Its Weakness <S%G772><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Unprofitableness, <S%G512><s%>

<S%G3762><s%> For Nothing <S%G1063><s%> Perfected <S%G5048><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Law, <S%G3551><s%> The Introduction <S%G1898><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Of A Better <S%G2909><s%> Hope <S%G1680><s%> ' By <S%G1223><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> We Draw Near <S%G1448><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To God. <S%G2316><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> ' <S%G2596><s%> By How Much It Was <S%G3745><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Apart From The <S%G5565><s%> Swearing Of An Oath, <S%G3728><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> They <S%G3303><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Without The <S%G5565><s%> Swearing Of An Oath <S%G3728><s%> Are <S%G1526><s%> Priests <S%G2409><s%> <S%G1096><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But He <S%G1161><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> , The Swearing Of An Oath, <S%G3728><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Says, <S%G3004><s%> As To <S%G4314><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Swore <S%G3660><s%> The Lord, <S%G2962><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Will Not Repent, <S%G3338><s%> Thou Art <S%G4771><s%> A Priest <S%G2409><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Ever <S%G165><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Order <S%G5010><s%> Of Melchizedek, <S%G3198><s%>
<S%G2596><s%> By So Much <S%G5118><s%> Of A Better <S%G2909><s%> Covenant <S%G1242><s%> Has Become <S%G1096><s%> Surety <S%G1450><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> They <S%G3303><s%> Many <S%G4119><s%> <S%G1526><s%> Are <S%G1096><s%> Priests <S%G2409><s%> On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> By Death <S%G2288><s%> Being Hindered From <S%G2967><s%> Continuing; <S%G3887><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But He, <S%G1161><s%> Because Of <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3306><s%> His Abiding <S%G846><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Ever, <S%G165><s%> Intransmissible <S%G531><s%> Has <S%G2192><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Priesthood. <S%G2420><s%>

Whence <S%G3606><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> To Save <S%G4982><s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Completely <S%G3838><s%> He Is Able <S%G1410><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Approach <S%G4334><s%> ' By <S%G1223><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To God, <S%G2316><s%> Always <S%G3842><s%> Living <S%G2198><s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Intercede <S%G1793><s%> For <S%G5228><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G5108><s%> For Such <S%G1063><s%> Us <S%G2254><s%> Became <S%G4241><s%> A High Priest, <S%G749><s%> Holy, <S%G3741><s%> Harmless, <S%G172><s%> Undefiled, <S%G283><s%> Separated <S%G5563><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Sinners, <S%G268><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Higher <S%G5308><s%> Than The <S%G3588><s%> Heavens <S%G3772><s%> Become : <S%G1096><s%>

Who <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Has Not <S%G2192><s%> ' <S%G2596><s%> Day By Day <S%G2250><s%> Necessity, <S%G318><s%> As <S%G5618><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> High Priests, <S%G749><s%> First <S%G4386><s%> For <S%G5228><s%> Own <S%G3588><s%> His <S%G2398><s%> Sins <S%G266><s%> Sacrifices <S%G2378><s%> To Offer Up, <S%G399><s%> Then <S%G1899><s%> For Those <S%G3588><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> People; <S%G2992><s%> <S%G5124><s%> For This <S%G1063><s%> He Did <S%G4160><s%> Once For All, <S%G2178><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> Having Offered Up. <S%G399><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> <S%G3551><s%> For The Law <S%G1063><s%> Men <S%G444><s%> Constitutes <S%G2525><s%> High Priests, <S%G749><s%> Who Have <S%G2192><s%> Infirmity; <S%G769><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3056><s%> But The Word <S%G1161><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Swearing Of The Oath, <S%G3728><s%> Which Is <S%G3588><s%> After <S%G3326><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Law, <S%G3551><s%> A Son <S%G5207><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Ever <S%G165><s%> Has Perfected. <S%G5048><s%>
